attr.title: A Tower in the Forest
attr.desc: Turn windmills to activate platforms, open doors or create shortcuts and make your way to the top in this short, atmospheric platformer about reaching your goals.
attr.inst: To download and prepare the 'A Tower in the Forest' game, visit https://michael-grieshofer.itch.io/a-tower-in-the-forest, download the '.pck' file, rename it to 'game.pck', move it to the 'gamedata' folder in your game directory, and launch the game.
